Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Acute tubulo - interstitial nephritis ( ATIN ) is an important cause of acute renal failure resulting from a variety of insults , including immune complex - mediated tubulo - interstitial injury , but drugs such as non - steroidal anti - inflammatory drugs ( NSAIDs ) are a far more frequent cause .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Acute tubulo-interstitial nephritis (ATIN) |
| Acute renal failure |
| Immune complex-mediated tubulo-interstitial injury |
| Acute renal failure resulting from a variety of insults |
| Acute tubulo-interstitial injury caused by drugs |
| Acute tubulo-interstitial injury caused by non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Acute tubulo-interstitial nephritis (ATIN) |
| Acute renal failure resulting from immune complex-mediated tubulo-interstitial injury |
| Acute renal failure resulting from a variety of insults |
| Acute tubulo-interstitial injury caused by drugs |
| Acute tubulo-interstitial injury caused by non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) |

Note: "Acute renal failure resulting from a variety of insults" is a broader term that includes multiple diseases, so it was kept in the table but it could be broken down into specific diseases if more context is available.
